function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Use of hazardous materials in construction","Impact":"Increased risk of exposure to toxins and pollutants, leading to negative health effects","Mitigation":"Use of non-toxic, sustainable materials in construction, proper disposal of hazardous materials","Technologies":"Green building materials, waste management systems","People":"Construction workers, residents in the built environment","Owner":"Construction companies, waste management companies"},{"Description":"Inefficient energy consumption in construction","Impact":"Higher energy consumption leading to increased environmental pollution and resource depletion","Mitigation":"Adoption of energy-efficient practices, use of renewable energy sources","Technologies":"Energy-efficient building designs, renewable energy technologies","People":"Construction companies, energy providers","Owner":"Government, construction companies"},{"Description":"Inadequate waste management in construction","Impact":"Accumulation of waste leading to pollution and health hazards","Mitigation":"Implementation of waste reduction strategies, efficient disposal and recycling of waste","Technologies":"Waste separation systems, recycling technologies","People":"Construction workers, residents in the built environment","Owner":"Construction companies"}]}
